Question
========

In a multiple regression model, the model as a whole is evaluated using the *F* test.

Which null hypothesis belongs to this test? 
Answerlist
----------
* $H_{0}:\;R = 0$
* $H_{0}:\;R > 0$
* $H_{0}:\;b_{1} = 0$
* $H_{0}:\;b_{1} \neq 0$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
